Description: Sliver of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with Helios herm symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Kallon. Trimmed. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0663.39.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1055)
